items.preText:
Right Sri Lanka's openers stride out. They'll be facing a target that's steeper than they would have thought at one point - but it still appears chaseable. We'll know soon enough if it is so.

Mortaza over the wicket
items.text: Full and on the stumps, defended back
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: over the top in the slot and he stands and delivers. full ball he lifts it over mid-off for four with great timing
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, SIX runs

items.text: the previous ball forces Mortaza to pull his length back, and Tharanga is able to go on the back foot and cut past point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, 2 runs

items.text: short and wide outside offstump, hardly rising above waist height and Tharanga slaps it through the covers for four
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, FOUR runs

items.text: brings the ball back in this time from round the wicket and it's defended back. Better length too
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: straighter and on the pads, he's able to tuck it for a single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, 1 run

items.preText:
Tamim was inspiring indeed. I admit I thought it was not the best decision for him to come out, but he proved me wrong.

Raphin Paul: "By the way Tamim's presence at the end of the innings helped Bangla to add 32 runs in the total..!!! that is huge..!!"

Sushant: "Tamim Iqbal sending a Statement of commitment to the whole team of Bangladesh... Who know's this could push the team to extend their limits and evolve out as winners for this Asia cup!"
items.text: the Fizz keeps it on a length on off, and it's defended
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, no run

items.text: goes fuller this time outside off, and it's stroked to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, no run

items.text: stand and deliver goes too full and angling into the batsman. Tharanga lifts it over mid-on
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, FOUR runs

items.text: all timing and wrists from Tharanga. No foot movement to speak of, but he carts Mustafizur over the covers by turning his wrists and opening the face of the bat
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length and bouncing a bit more, Tharanga rises up to pat it down into the legside
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: loud shout Erasumus doesn't give it, and Bangladesh review. The question is did it pitch in line. Full and on the stumps, struck the right-hander on the pads. And it's pitched on leg-stump. Three Reds - and Bangladesh have their first wicket. Kusal Mendis falls first ball.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mendis, OUT

dismissal.text: BKG Mendis lbw b Mustafizur Rahman 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

items.preText:
Mortaza stays round the wicket

Tanmay Srivasta: "How scintillating was that straight 6 from Upul Tharanga?! His figures are frustrating but when in full flow, he has got to be one of the most elegant and watchable opening batsmen out there!"
items.text: angling into the batsman, tapped away into the legside
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: keeps this back of a length on off and he can cut it away to third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: digs it in short, punched to extra cover for a quick single. Direct hit, but the Bangladesh fielders aren't appealing too vociferously - with good reason. the batsman was comfortably in
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to MDKJ Perera, 1 run

items.text: strays on the pads and Tharanga isn't going to let go of free gifts like that. beautifully timed again, just a flick that travelled past the fine leg inside the circle and into the fence
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, FOUR runs

items.text: keeps it fuller and straighter, driven to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: chopped on! back of a length on the stumps, coming into the batsman and Tharanga is cramped for room. Wrong choice of shot, he tried to steer it down to third man but only gets the under-edge and the ball crashes into the stumps
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, OUT

dismissal.text: WU Tharanga  b Mashrafe Mortaza 27 (16b 4x4 1x6) SR: 168.75

items.preText: WATCH - Dasgupta says Rahim was rewarded for knowing when to attack and when to defend
items.text: full and on the stumps, driven back past the bowler with no real timing.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.text: punched to cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.preText: Tasmeem: "I'm astonished no one mentioned Graeme Smith's vigil with a broken hand to save a test. The greatest bravado I've seen." - Yes, that was a brave stand too.
items.text: strays in line, and Kusal P picks it up off his pads and goes over the top, into the midwicket fence
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to MDKJ Perera, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length and coming back into the batsman, he tries to swat it back but only gets an under-edge that rolls back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.text: short again, but not rising high. He wanted to cut it past point, but doesn't get the timing right. It was a tad too close to cut too.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.text: good lenght on the stumps, defended into the off-side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.preText: Abhiram: "Is Chandimal injured? Is he a part of the squad?" - He is injured and not part of the squad.
items.text: length ball on off and defended with a straight bat
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to de Silva, no run
